Tips, strategies, and insights to maximize your credit card rewards

Here’s Why I Picked Bilt Palladium in “Bilt 2.0”

The original Bilt card holds a unique place in my wallet as the only product that effectively gamified housing expenses. However, as the company transitions to its 'Bilt Card 2.0' model, the exceptional value of those early days appears to be over.

By Giorgio SarroJan 24, 2026

My luxurious spring break in Thailand with 120k Hilton Points

I escaped graduate school for a luxury spring break in Thailand by using 120,000 Hilton points to book the Cape Kudu Hotel. This stay was worth $1,400 in cash, but I secured it for free by leveraging the "5th Night Free" perk and a sign-up bonus from my Hilton Surpass card. My Gold status also provided me with great benefits like a room upgrade, daily breakfast, and a private longboat excursion.

By Giorgio SarroJan 18, 2026

Asia to Europe in the best business class for 62K Chase Points

I booked an 11-hour Qatar Airways Qsuite flight that sells for around $3,200… for 62,000 Chase points + ~$200 in fees. Same route (Seoul → Doha → Milan), same lie-flat luxury, but paid like a grad student. Here’s exactly how I pulled it off (and how you can too).

By Giorgio SarroJan 7, 2026
